column4: hello, could I get some help with my wireless card? I can't connect my laptop via wireless interface. Please check the lspci output here: http://paste.ubuntu.com/653893/
could you also post your output of ifconfig and iwconfig?
type "sudo ifconfig wlan0 up" and repost your ifconfig output
wlan0: ERROR while getting interface flags: No such device
it shouldn't. post your ifconfig output now
so what do you think? I see my wireless network listed but it won't connect
so now your adapter is working and networkmanager is listing it?
okay, is your adapter integrated or is it an additional card/usbdongle?
okay, is your adapter integrated or is it an additional card/usbdongle?
